## blockRendering.RenderInfo.getInRowSpacing\_() method

Calculate the width of a spacer element in a row based on the previous and next elements in that row. For instance, extra padding is added between two editable fields.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected getInRowSpacing_(prev: Measurable | null, next: Measurable | null): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prev | [Measurable](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.measurable_class.md) \| null | The element before the spacer. |
|  next | [Measurable](./blockly.blockrendering_namespace.measurable_class.md) \| null | The element after the spacer. |

**Returns:**

number

The size of the spacing between the two elements.
